solution_line_template: If the standard poodle is {standard_taller_than_miniature} inches taller than the miniature poodle, then the miniature poodle is {standard_poodle_height}-{standard_taller_than_miniature}=<<{standard_poodle_height}-{standard_taller_than_miniature}={miniature_poodle_height}>>{miniature_poodle_height} inches tall.

And if the miniature poodle is 8 inches taller than the toy poodle, that the toy poodle is {miniature_poodle_height}-{miniature_taller_than_toy}=<<{miniature_poodle_height}-{miniature_taller_than_toy}={toy_poodle_height}>>{toy_poodle_height} inches tall.
